properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 3:01PM EST until January 4 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 10 to 20
knots and waves to 3 to 5 feet. For the Gale Watch, west winds
20 to 25 knots with gusts up to 40 knots and waves 6 to 9 feet
possible.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Grand Haven.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 AM to 10 PM EST
Saturday. For the Gale Watch, from Sunday afternoon through
late Sunday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT
